title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not visible in the application.
EB: The column icons should be visible when connecting to a Derby database.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following details: 

Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
User Name: root
Password: root

4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query. 6.
